name: Modules.BLE.CentralManager
summary: An object that scans for, discovers, connects to, and manages peripherals.

events.name: didUpdateState
events.summary: A event called when centrel manager state updated
events.description: Invoked whenever the central manager's state has been updated. Commands should only be issued when the state is Modules.BLE.MANAGER_STATE_POWERED_ON. A state below Modules.BLE.MANAGER_STATE_POWERED_ON implies that scanning has stopped and any connected peripherals have been disconnected. If the state moves below Modules.BLE.MANAGER_STATE_POWERED_OFF, all Peripheral objects obtained from this central manager become invalid and must be retrieved or discovered again.

methods.name: cancelPeripheralConnection
methods.summary: Cancels an active or pending connection to peripheral. Note that this is non-blocking, and any Peripheral commands that are still pending to peripheral may or may not complete.

parameters.name: peripheral
parameters.summary: peripheral object which connnection will be canceled

methods.name: connectPeripheral
methods.summary: Initiates a connection to peripheral. Connection attempts never time out and, depending on the outcome, will result in a call to either didConnectPeripheral or didFailToConnectPeripheral event. Pending attempts are cancelled automatically upon deallocation of peripheral, and explicitly via Modules.BLE.CentralManager.cancelPeripheralConnection}.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: This parameter is specific for the iphone, ipad platforms. An optional dictionary specifying connection behavior options. all available dictionary keys are defined as Modules.BLE.CONNECT_PERIPHERAL_OPTIONS_KEY_*

methods.name: createPeripheral
methods.summary: Creates a Modules.BLE.Peripheral class object with the given address.

methods.name: isAccessFineLocationPermissionGranted
methods.summary: Determines whether the ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission is granted or not.
methods.description: ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission is provided at runtime by the app user. To request this permission use requestAccessFineLocationPermission method

returns.summary: Returns true if the ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission is granted

methods.name: registerForConnectionEvents
methods.summary: Calls connectionEventDidOccur event when a connection event occurs matching any of the given options. Passing nil in the option parameter clears any prior registered matching options.

methods.name: requestAccessFineLocationPermission
methods.description: This permission is necessary for the Bluetooth device to scan the nearby BLE devices or other Bluetooth operations.

methods.name: retrieveConnectedPeripheralsWithServices
methods.summary: Returns a list of the peripherals connected to the system whose services match a given set of criteria.

methods.name: retrievePeripheralsWithIdentifiers
methods.summary: Returns a list of known peripherals by their identifiers.
